alert.note: Alert for Scotts Bluff (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 5:32PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Scotts Bluff County through 500 PM MDT... At 431 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Terrytown, or over Scottsbluff, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Scottsbluff Airport around 440 PM MDT. Scottsbluff around 445 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
